name: Silencer
title: Nortrom
lore: Nortrom drains intelligence from his victims, growing more powerful as he steals their knowledge.

arcaneCurse.name: Arcane Curse
arcaneCurse.description: Curses enemies in an area, dealing damage and slowing. Casting extends the curse.

glaivesOfWisdom.name: Glaives of Wisdom
glaivesOfWisdom.description: Silencer's attacks deal bonus pure damage based on intelligence.

lastWord.name: Last Word
lastWord.description: Marks an enemy. If they cast a spell or the duration expires, they are silenced and damaged.

globalSilence.name: Global Silence
globalSilence.description: Silences all enemy heroes on the map.

25: +25% Glaives of Wisdom Intelligence as Damage
